Body:
sigma_diag = sigma_noise * (1 + np.heaviside(np.arange(len(time)) - len(
    time) // 2, 0))
noise = sigma_diag * white_gaussian(len(time))
x = rect(time, 100 * Ts, 250 * Ts, 1.0, noise=noise)
for blow in [None, b2]:
    y, Uy = FIRuncFilter(x, sigma_diag, b1, Ub, blow=blow, kind='diag')
    assert len(y) == len(x)
    assert len(Uy) == len(x)
